name: Birds Birds Birds (Matías Paredes)
description:
BIRDS BIRDS BIRDS they're everywhere! My car's gonna fall! Throw your leftover popcorn at them, that'll teach'em! BEWARE THE MIGHTY CHIMANGO

Balance the car with doves. They follow the popcorn!

CONTROLS

Click to throw popcorn

Aim with the mouse

Have fun!

Developed for Ludum Dare 40 Theme:  "The more you have, the worse it is"

Original music by Moon Moon Moon https://themoonmoonmoon.bandcamp.com/
